34  inline String ToString(const TYPE& object)

55  template <typename T>
56  T TrimLeft(const T& str, const T& strChars)
57  {
58  T outstr = str;
59  outstr.erase(0, outstr.find_first_not_of(strChars));
60  return outstr;
61  }
